00044 struct CalibrationParams
00045 {
00046     double alphaCNCalibration;
00047     double alphaCNCalibration_X;
00048     double alphaCNCalibration_Y;
00049     double betaCNCalibration;
00050     double betaCNCalibration_X;
00051     double betaCNCalibration_Y;
00052 };

00054 /**
00055  * @brief  The engine for copy number calculations post log2 ratio calculation.
00056  * This engine works on one experiment at a time.
00057  *
00058  */
00059 class CNAnalysisEngine : public BaseEngine
00060 {
00061 private:
00062     BaseEngine* m_pEngine;
00063 
00064     AffxArray<CNAnalysisMethod> m_vCNAnalysisMethods;
00065     AffxArray<CNReporter> m_vCNReporters;
00066     bool m_bComponentRun;
00067     void defineOptions();
00068     void checkOptionsImp();
00069     void runImp();
00070 
00071     /**
00072      * Print out a warning message
00073      */
00074     void warning(const std::string& strMessage) {
00075         Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: " + strMessage);
00076     }
00077 
00078     /**
00079      * Error out by calling clear() and Err::errAbort()
00080      */
00081     void error(const std::string& strMessage) {
00082         clear();
00083         Err::errAbort(strMessage);
00084     }
00085 
00086 public:
00087         void clear();
00088         virtual std::string getEngineName() { return CNAnalysisEngine::EngineName(); }
00089         static const std::string EngineName() { return "CNAnalysisEngine"; }
00090         /**
00091          * Constructor
00092          */
00093         CNAnalysisEngine();
00094 
00095         /**
00096          * Destructor
00097          */
00098         ~CNAnalysisEngine();
00099 
00100         /*! A class to register the engine. */
00101         class Reg : public EngineReg
00102         {
00103         public:
00104             /*! Constructor - register the engine. */
00105             Reg() : EngineReg(CNAnalysisEngine::EngineName())
00106             {
00107             }
00108 
00109             /*! Creates an object.
00110              * @return The object.
00111              */
00112             BaseEngine *MakeObject() { return new CNAnalysisEngine; }
00113         };
00114 
00115         /*! The one and only registration object. */
00116         static Reg reg;
00117 
00118         /*! Converts the type to the engine type.
00119          * @param chip The pointer to the base engine object.
00120          * @return The engine type or NULL if not compatible.
00121          */
00122         static CNAnalysisEngine * FromBase(BaseEngine *engine);
00123 
00124     void defineSharedOptions();
00125     void defineSharedStates();
00126 
00127     void createAnalysis();
00128     void setEngine(BaseEngine* p)
00129     {
00130         if (p == NULL) {p = this;}
00131         m_pEngine = p;
00132     }
00133     void process(CNExperiment& objExperiment, CNProbeSetArray& vProbeSets, CNProbeArray* vProbes=NULL);
00134     void postProcessing(CNExperiment& objExperiment, CNProbeSetArray& vProbeSets);
00135     void calculateCalibrationParameters();
00136     bool needToCalculateCalibrationParameters();
00137     CalibrationParams retrieveCalibrationParams();
00138 };

00141 /*
00142  * Auxiliary predicate for searches using equal_range on probe set names
00143  */
00144 struct ProbeSetNameCompare : std::binary_function<const CNProbeSet*, const CNProbeSet*, bool>
00145 {
00146     bool operator()(const CNProbeSet* lhs, const CNProbeSet* rhs) const {
00147         return lhs->getProbeSetName() < rhs->getProbeSetName();
00148     }
00149 };
